text.title: Citizenship of Australian terrorists overseas under question
text.head: Citizenship of Australian terrorists overseas under question
Sources

list.item: James Bennett, Eliza Borrello, Chris Uhlmann. "Government promises laws to strip citizenship from dual-nationality terrorists within weeks, amid debate within Cabinet" — ABC News (Australia) , May 27, 2015
AAP and Reuters. "'No compromise' for Isis fighter Khaled Sharrouf's wife if she returns to Australia" — The Guardian , May 26, 2015
Daniel Hurst. "Dual-national jihadists face loss of Australian citizenship, but not sole nationals yet" — The Guardian , May 26, 2015
